message: Let's make a deal. I take $60, you take $40. It's important to settle this early because the value of the money decreases with each round.
Your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor. Let's be reasonable - I take $55, you take $45. The money's losing value, so let's settle this now.
Bob, it's my turn to propose, and I'm feeling generous. I'll take $55, leaving you with $45. Let's wrap this up before the money shrinks further.
